value.name: TN man invents cooling collars, packs to keep dogs, children safe in hot weather
value.description: Tennessee inventor Phillip Pitts spent the past 18 years designing the T-Cool K9 collar for dogs and the Cool-R Kid Pack for children. They're made out of nontoxic plant oils, are cool to the ...

value.name: 5 Great Things: Memphiz Zoo welcomes baby giraffes, Mike Conley donates to Methodist Healthcare
value.description: Just in time for summer time heat, Tennessee inventor Phillip Pitts designed the T-Cool K9 collar for dogs and the Cool-R Kid Pack for children. He even donated a K-9 collar to a police dog.
